name: Halfday trekking Nam Hong (Thong Nguyen) – Nam Khoa Commune
description: Hoang Su Phi terraced fields were originated from hundred years ago. Cultivating on the narrow edge of the forest land , along rivers and streams did not bring a lot of rice and corn. It was the reason why the locals tried to form terraces cultivated on the slopes of the hills. From generations to generation, they had learnt many lessons and experience in farming as well as the conservating and developing the terraced fields. These terraces do not only provide food for the people here , but now they are becoming landscapes attracted the attention of domestic and forein photographers and tourists.
